label: SMA Tripower 8 SE V1.2
info:
Changes:

Selling flow: 
Created an input boolean so that the checks in others flow if electricity is beeing sold, does not depend on a figure. 
It now depends on a boolean on or off.

zero export flow is beeing simplified.
It is easier to understand.

When importprice is negative onlmy start charging during this time and charge battery on the negative
This needs to be tested still!

name: Active setpoint -2500 w (charge batt) 40149
Active setpoint 5000 w (Discharge batt) 40149
Active setpoint 0 w (Balance) 40149
Take control of the inverter
Release control back to the inverter
Winterflow: Charge the battery every night at the 4 cheapest hours if the solar forecast today is smaller then 15 Kw untill 100%  full
Turn off zero export + DAC --> Reset power slider to 100%

outputProperties.value: Turn off zero export --> Reset power slider to 100%

name: Turn on zero export --> set power slider to 100%
4 seasons flow: Zero export when export or import price of electricity is negative

func:

return [{payload: lim}];

return [{payload: lim}];

topic: Reset active power limit slider to 100%
